org.apache.ignite.hadoop.mapreduce

Class IgniteHadoopWeightedMapReducePlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.hadoop.planner.HadoopAbstractMapReducePlanner
      • org.apache.ignite.hadoop.mapreduce.IgniteHadoopWeightedMapReducePlanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HadoopMapReducePlanner

    public class IgniteHadoopWeightedMapReducePlanner
extends HadoopAbstractMapReducePlanner
    Map-reduce planner which assigns mappers and reducers based on their "weights". Weight describes how much resources are required to execute particular map or reduce task.

    Plan creation consists of two steps: assigning mappers and assigning reducers.

    Mappers are assigned based on input split data location. For each input split we search for nodes where its data is stored. Planner tries to assign mappers to their affinity nodes first. This process is governed by two properties:

    • localMapperWeight - weight of a map task when it is executed on an affinity node;
    • remoteMapperWeight - weight of a map task when it is executed on a non-affinity node.
    Planning algorithm assign mappers so that total resulting weight on all nodes is minimum possible.

    Reducers are assigned differently. First we try to distribute reducers across nodes with mappers. This approach could minimize expensive data transfer over network. Reducer assigned to a node with mapper is considered local. Otherwise it is considered remote. This process continue until certain weight threshold is reached what means that current node is already too busy and it should not have higher priority over other nodes any more. Threshold can be configured using preferLocalReducerThresholdWeight property.

    When local reducer threshold is reached on all nodes, we distribute remaining reducers based on their local and remote weights in the same way as it is done for mappers. This process is governed by two properties:

    • localReducerWeight - weight of a reduce task when it is executed on a node with mappers;
    • remoteReducerWeight - weight of a map task when it is executed on a node without mappers.

                                       Collection<ClusterNode> nodes,

        Prepares map-reduce execution plan for the given job and topology.
        Parameters:
        job - Job.
        nodes - Topology.
        oldPlan - Old plan in case of partial failure.
        Returns:
        Map reduce plan.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If an error occurs.

      • getLocalMapperWeight

        public int getLocalMapperWeight()
        Get local mapper weight. This weight is added to a node when a mapper is assigned and it's input split data is located on this node (at least partially).

        Defaults to DFLT_LOC_MAPPER_WEIGHT.

        Returns:
        Remote mapper weight.

      • setLocalMapperWeight

        public IgniteHadoopWeightedMapReducePlanner setLocalMapperWeight(int locMapperWeight)
        Set local mapper weight. See getLocalMapperWeight() for more information.
        Parameters:
        locMapperWeight - Local mapper weight.
        Returns:
        this for chaining.

      • getRemoteMapperWeight

        public int getRemoteMapperWeight()
        Get remote mapper weight. This weight is added to a node when a mapper is assigned, but it's input split data is not located on this node.

        Defaults to DFLT_RMT_MAPPER_WEIGHT.

        Returns:
        Remote mapper weight.

        rmtMapperWeight - Remote mapper weight.
        Returns:
        this for chaining.

      • getLocalReducerWeight

        public int getLocalReducerWeight()
        Get local reducer weight. This weight is added to a node when a reducer is assigned and the node have at least one assigned mapper.

        Defaults to DFLT_LOC_REDUCER_WEIGHT.

        Returns:
        Local reducer weight.

      • setLocalReducerWeight

        public IgniteHadoopWeightedMapReducePlanner setLocalReducerWeight(int locReducerWeight)

        Parameters:
        locReducerWeight - Local reducer weight.
        Returns:
        this for chaining.

      • getRemoteReducerWeight

        public int getRemoteReducerWeight()
        Get remote reducer weight. This weight is added to a node when a reducer is assigned, but the node doesn't have any assigned mappers.

        Defaults to DFLT_RMT_REDUCER_WEIGHT.

        Returns:
        Remote reducer weight.

        Returns:
        this for chaining.

      • getPreferLocalReducerThresholdWeight

        public int getPreferLocalReducerThresholdWeight()
        Get reducer migration threshold weight. When threshold is reached, a node with mappers is no longer considered as preferred for further reducer assignments.

        Defaults to DFLT_PREFER_LOCAL_REDUCER_THRESHOLD_WEIGHT.

        Returns:
        Reducer migration threshold weight.

      • setPreferLocalReducerThresholdWeight
